char_info.char_desc: The Queen of the Yao Tribe

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You greatly angered me by making me bald and defeating me a second time.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I didn't lose any strands this time around. I'm greatly happy I was able to turn off your spell.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: What am I going to do now?

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You'll become a poor old woman.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Or perhaps you should be a dead woman.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: At last, you have stopped Reimu's hair from having a growth explosion.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I've had enough of this. For my future, me and my daughter are just going to travel.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm respectful to youkai-borns, but Reimu is demanding these sorts of incidents stop.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: But I need to look beautiful again.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Reimu can cut her hair and construct a wig that we can give to you as a gift.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: But I also found out that keratin vitamins can restore my hair to normal...

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Farewell. May we meet again one day...
